## time_tag(name, [[value,] html_options])

Creates a time tag, if no value is given it will default to current, defaults to 24 hour

options

* twelvehour:			set to true if 12 hours is needed
* minute_interval:		set to int value if intervals in minutes are needed
* show_seconds:			set to true if seconds are needed

	time_tag("Installation[time]",new Date(2007,10,20,1,1,1,1))
	 
	 => 
	 
	<select id='Installation[time][hour]' value='1' name='Installation[time][hour]' ><option value='0' >0</option><option value='1' selected='selected' >1</option><option value='2' >2</option><option
